comments:
Using attachment 62215, I purposely did not add Axis2 facet when I create the Web project.  Here's what I found:

1) For bottom-up Axis2 Web service, the Axis2 configuration page shows up and the wizard completes successfully.  However, nothing was generated.

2) For top-down Axis2 Web service, the fields are not filled in for the Axis2 skeleton config page and I got this error when clicking Finish:

java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: javax.wsdl.factory.WSDLFactory
	at java.lang.ClassLoader.findClass(ClassLoader.java:358)
	at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:306)
	at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:251)
	at org.eclipse.osgi.framework.internal.core.BundleLoader.findClassInternal(BundleLoader.java:429)
	at org.eclipse.osgi.framework.internal.core.BundleLoader.findClass(BundleLoader.java:369)
	at org.eclipse.osgi.framework.internal.core.BundleLoader.findClass(BundleLoader.java:357)
	at org.eclipse.osgi.internal.baseadaptor.DefaultClassLoader.loadClass(DefaultClassLoader.java:83)
	at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:251)
	at org.apache.tools.ant.AntClassLoader.findBaseClass(AntClassLoader.java:1197)
	at org.apache.tools.ant.AntClassLoader.loadClass(AntClassLoader.java:990)
	at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:251)
	at org.eclipse.jst.ws.axis2.core.utils.ClassLoadingUtil.loadClassFromAntClassLoader(ClassLoadingUtil.java:179)
	at org.eclipse.jst.ws.axis2.consumption.core.utils.WSDLPropertyReader.readWSDL(WSDLPropertyReader.java:53)
	at org.eclipse.jst.ws.axis2.consumption.core.utils.DefaultCodegenUtil.populateModelParamsFromWSDL(DefaultCodegenUtil.java:54)
	at org.eclipse.jst.ws.axis2.creation.core.command.Axis2DefaultingCommand.execute(Axis2DefaultingCommand.java:75)
	

3) With Axis2 client, the fields in the Axis2 Client configuration page is empty and clicking Finish resulted in:

Exception occured while code generation the wsdl
    java.lang.NullPointerException
    at org.eclipse.jst.ws.axis2.consumption.core.utils.WSDL2JavaGenerator.getAxisService(WSDL2JavaGenerator.java:366)
    at org.eclipse.jst.ws.axis2.consumption.core.command.Axis2ClientCodegenCommand.execute(Axis2ClientCodegenCommand.java:85)

This might be solved by bug 175143.  We need to retry after that bug is fixed.

Also, for top-down Axis2 scenario, I'm getting the "java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: javax.wsdl.factory.WSDLFactory" error even when specifying a non-existing project (not just one without the Axis2 facet).

Fix dropped together with bug 183046 and had been released to WTP 2.0 as
v200704260418.
